osyfe

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.Screen

  • public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the screen output and related features, the input and the game loop.

      • open

        public static void open(Overlay overlay)
        Opens the game window, adds the given overlay to it and starts the game loop. This function does not terminate until the window is closed.

        Enables raw mouse input (without OS manipulation). Disables the cursor.
